verses.verse: <S%H3426>"Surely<s%> there is a <S%H4161>mine<s%> for <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and a <S%H4725>place<s%> for <S%H2091>gold<s%> which they <S%H2212>refine.<s%>
<S%H1270>Iron<s%> is <S%H3947>taken<s%> out of the <S%H6083>earth,<s%> and <S%H5154>copper<s%> is <S%H6694>smelted<s%> out of the <S%H68>ore.<s%>

Man <S%H7760>sets<s%> an <S%H7093>end<s%> to <S%H2822>darkness,<s%> and searches <S%H2713>out,<s%> to the furthest <S%H8503>bound,<s%> the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H652>obscurity<s%> and of thick <S%H6757>darkness.<s%>

He breaks <S%H6555>open<s%> a <S%H5158>shaft<s%> away from where people <S%H1481>live.<s%> They are <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> by the <S%H7272>foot.<s%> They <S%H1809>hang<s%> <S%H5128>far<s%> from <S%H582>men,<s%> they swing back and forth.
As for the <S%H776>earth,<s%> out of it <S%H3318>comes<s%> <S%H3899>bread;<s%> Underneath it is turned <S%H2015>up<s%> as it were by <S%H784>fire.<s%>
<S%H5601>Sapphires<s%> <S%H4725>come<s%> from its <S%H68>rocks.<s%> It has <S%H6083>dust<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
That <S%H5410>path<s%> no <S%H5861>bird<s%> of prey <S%H3045>knows,<s%> neither has the <S%H344>falcon<s%>'s <S%H5869>eye<s%> seen <S%H7805>it.<s%>
The <S%H7830>proud<s%> <S%H1121>animals<s%> have not <S%H1869>trodden<s%> <S%H7826>it,<s%> nor has the fierce lion passed by <S%H5710>there.<s%>
He puts <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> on the flinty <S%H2496>rock,<s%> and he <S%H2015>overturns<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> by the <S%H8328>roots.<s%>
He cuts <S%H1234>out<s%> <S%H2975>channels<s%> among the <S%H6697>rocks.<s%> His <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H7200>sees<s%> every precious <S%H3366>thing.<s%>
He <S%H2280>binds<s%> the <S%H5104>streams<s%> that they <S%H1065>don't<s%> trickle. The thing that is <S%H8587>hidden<s%> he brings <S%H3318>forth<s%> to <S%H216>light.<s%>
"But <S%H370>where<s%> shall <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> be <S%H4672>found?<s%> Where is the <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>
<S%H582>Man<s%> <S%H3045>doesn't<s%> know its <S%H6187>price;<s%> Neither is it <S%H4672>found<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H2416>living.<s%>
The <S%H8415>deep<s%> <S%H559>says,<s%> <S%H3220><s%> 'It isn't in me.' The sea <S%H559>says,<s%> 'It isn't with me.'
It <S%H5414>can't<s%> be gotten for <S%H5458>gold,<s%> neither shall <S%H3701>silver<s%> be <S%H8254>weighed<s%> for its <S%H4242>price.<s%>
It <S%H5541>can't<s%> be valued with the <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H211>Ophir,<s%> with the <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H7718>onyx,<s%> or the <S%H5601>sapphire.<s%>
<S%H2091>Gold<s%> and <S%H2137>glass<s%> <S%H6186>can't<s%> equal <S%H8545>it,<s%> neither shall it be exchanged for <S%H3627>jewels<s%> of fine <S%H6337>gold.<s%>
No <S%H2142>mention<s%> shall be made of <S%H7215>coral<s%> or of <S%H1378>crystal.<s%> <S%H4901>Yes,<s%> the price of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> is above <S%H6443>rubies.<s%>
The <S%H6357>topaz<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia<s%> shall not <S%H6186>equal<s%> <S%H5541>it,<s%> Neither shall it be valued with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold.<s%>
<S%H370>Where<s%> then does <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H4725>from?<s%> Where is the place of <S%H998>understanding?<s%>
Seeing it is <S%H5956>hidden<s%> from the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of all <S%H2416>living,<s%> and kept <S%H5641>close<s%> from the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
<S%H11>Destruction<s%> and <S%H4194>Death<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H8085><s%> 'We have heard a <S%H8088>rumor<s%> of it with our <S%H241>ears.<s%>'
<S%H430>"God<s%> <S%H995>understands<s%> its <S%H1870>way,<s%> and he <S%H3045>knows<s%> its <S%H4725>place.<s%>
For he <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and <S%H7200>sees<s%> under the whole <S%H8064>sky.<s%>
He establishes the force of the <S%H7307>wind.<s%> <S%H8505>Yes,<s%> he measures out the <S%H4325>waters<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%>
When he <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2706>decree<s%> for the <S%H4306>rain,<s%> and a <S%H1870>way<s%> for the <S%H2385>lightning<s%> of the <S%H6963>thunder;<s%>
then he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5608>it,<s%> and declared <S%H3559>it.<s%> He established <S%H2713>it,<s%> yes, and searched it out.

To <S%H120>man<s%> he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3374><s%> 'Behold, the fear of the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> that is <S%H2451>wisdom.<s%> To <S%H5493>depart<s%> from <S%H7451>evil<s%> is <S%H998>understanding.<s%>'"
